question:
Consider the following statements: 
  1. Indian Telegraph (Amendment) Act 2006 was an amendment to the Indian Telegraph Act, 1885 to enable provision of all types of telegraph services in rural areas.
  2.  Universal Service Obligation Fund (USOF) was established by this act to provide subsidy support for rural wire-line broadband connections 
  3. The fundamental objective of Universal Service Obligation Fund (USOF) was to provide access to ‘basic’ telegraph services
    Bring out the correct statements:
explanation: Indian Telegraph Act 2006 was an amendment to the Indian Telegraph Act, 1885 to enable provision of all types of telegraph services in rural areas. The fundamental objective of Universal Service Obligation Fund (USOF) was to provide access to ‘basic’ telegraph services.
